thread.section_title: The Natural Sapphire Company Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of The Natural Sapphire Company | www.thenaturalsapphirecompany.com
thread.title: Glen White
thread.title_full: The Natural Sapphire Company reviewed by Glen White

author: Glen White
title: Glen White
text: The process from beginning to end was perfect. Great stone collection, very well displayed and detailed. Response from them was immediate and very helpful (even on Sunday night). They expedited my order and got the ring to me early. The production was perfect and the ring is fantastic. Plus when I received the ring box is a heavy metal design and with my ring came very professional presented reports on my stones. These guys are awesome.
